events.comment: If the player is jumping -> Set player animation to Jumping
If the player is on the floor AND is not moving -> Set player animation to Idle
If the player is on the floor AND is moving -> Set player animation to Running
If the left arrow key is pressed -> The player sprite faces left
If the right arrow key is pressed -> The player sprite faces right
If the player collides with a coin -> Delete the coin, play a collecting coin sound, and increment a counter for the number of coins collected
Updates the UI that dislpays number of coins collected
If player has collected 2 coins -> Change scene to "Win Scene"
If the player collides with the Fall Zone -> Change scene to "Lose Scene"
